title: Natural Therapies - SHA Wellness Clinic
author: Raúl Fernández Gómez
cleaned_text: At SHA we provide proven effective natural therapies and complementary treatments. Our aim is to reactivate the regulatory and regenerative power of the body, which is often blocked or weakened by unhealthy habits.
